title: Love this app but hate the update
review: I love shopping on depop. This is from a shopper‚Äôs perspective, not a buyers. The worst I‚Äôve ever experienced is sellers either not shipping or not being good at communicating and I tried reaching out to depop about it but ultimately I just let it go because it is what it is. But other than that, I still shopped on depop more cautiously, but now the app is way less appealing to me because the new layout is, there‚Äôs two rows of whatever you‚Äôre searching for which means more scrolling and more time spent on me trying to find what I want. And I know it‚Äôs probably not a huge deal to most especially with issues I was talking about earlier but I just hate it so much. I really prefer the layout of how it was before.
developerResponse:
{'id': 18385960, 'body': "Hey there,

Thanks for the feedback. We love hearing about what we can do to improve Depop for our Community. When you succeed, we succeed. We'll be passing this along to our Product Team.

Team Depop
", 'modified': '2020-10-09T21:40:34Z'}

title: favors aesthetic accounts; notification bugs
review: I will click everywhere on the app and it will still say I have unread notifications when I don‚Äôt- super annoying. Easy to list and item hard to sell due to depops ‚Äúexplore‚Äù page only showcases ‚Äúaesthetically pleasing‚Äù photos- photos from their verified people even if the item is sold already it will stay up for days. For people who are first starting out it is hard to reach out to people unless you put a lot of tags- which is actually against the guidelines and over all looks ugly on your photos. Shipping with depop take a giant chunk of your money away when making a sale but if you ship by yourself you are still paying $6/$7 to ship an item AND you still have to pay depop a fee. Disappointed and annoyed.
developerResponse: {'id': 4540698, 'body': "Sorry to read you're not enjoying your experience! Please note that our in-house curation team keep an eye out for great images of fun items rather than specific items themselves. We'd encourage you to try and check out some of the image styles on the Explore page if you're hoping to make it on there. Thanks, Team Depop", 'modified': '2018-08-06T12:02:28Z'}

title: Sellers are dishonest and disappointing
review: This app is the least professional of any of the online selling apps. I‚Äôve used Poshmark and Mercari with very few issues. All of the sellers I have come into contact with on Depop have sent me items that qualified for a dispute, but I didn‚Äôt want to deal with it. The items did not match the description, photos have all been purposefully deceitful. Sellers should not stay on your app or be able to get by with five stars when they ship out damaged merchandise for a pretty penny. I don‚Äôt love the layout or shipping options that sellers have. I feel like shipping has been exorbitantly expensive. I sell online too. I get it. It‚Äôs why I use these apps and don‚Äôt appreciate being treated like this as a customer. I will be leaving depop soon. Highly disappointed with every interaction I have had on here.
developerResponse: {'id': 8771745, 'body': "Hi there, we're sorry to hear you haven't had the best experience with one of our sellers. Do know that transaction made within the app are protected even if they're not as described. Just send a report to our support team and they'll send some instructions on what to do.\n\nLove, Depop", 'modified': '2019-05-21T07:35:14Z'}

title: Terrible Customer Service
review:
Depop offers NO seller / buyer protection, handles all transactions with a 3rd party, and has a huge scam problem. I have used nearly every clothing selling app there is & Depop is by far the worst. They use PayPal for all transactions - so not only will you be charged 10% of your sale by Depop fees, but you will also be charged with PayPal fees. Poshmark, Mercari and Vinted are all far more worth your time to sell or buy clothes. I highly recommend Poshmark if you want to be charged with less fees, receive seller protection and have acceptable customer service. 

There are far better clothing selling platforms that do NOT make you face more fees by going through PayPal as a third party. Not sure why Depop can‚Äôt handle $ on their own without using PayPal as a third party? It means more money for them and less for users.

title: Love the app! But please make better computer/browser interface.
review: I love Depop; it is such an incredible way to buy sustainable clothes and for people to make money. However, I would really like to see a better online interface that can be accessed on the computer. Online shopping is usually easier online rather than on an app, and Depop is great in that their app is amazing (probably because it‚Äôs intended to be an app), but I would also like to shop Depop on a web browser on my computer. Currently that interface is bad and doesn‚Äôt even have all of the functioning features the app does. Please make a better web browser interface!!

title: Amazing App
review: This app was the answer to my prayers. That other one posh mark demands high end and near perfect condition items. What about vintage? What about cute stuff that might have a little hole in it but you want to get rid of for a reasonable price? It‚Äôs amazing because it brings people together to reuse and make a little extra cash (or a lot of you work really hard at it). For the most part the Depop community is wonderful and I‚Äôve had 98% good experiences. The one criticism I have of the app is that it updates like weekly! It‚Äôs crazy, every time I got to open it, it seems it needs a new update and it‚Äôs pretty annoying!
developerResponse: {'id': 4690997, 'body': 'Thanks for leaving us a review! We release updates often because we want to provide our users with feature improvements or glitch fixes ASAP; we hope you agree that this is worth it. Thanks again! Team Depop', 'modified': '2018-08-16T16:00:01Z'}

title: over priced items
review: i‚Äôve had this app for a while and i used to be able to buy USED stuff at a reasonable price (which it should be considering it‚Äôs used) but lately people selling things are selling them above retail and way over priced. the more people who over price their items the more likely others are to do the same. depop also takes a sorta big chunk out of the money when someone buys something from you and it‚Äôs very annoying. i sold an item for $10 and was hoping to get $10 from it but depop took some out of it and i got $4 which is annoying

title: ugly layout now
review: before the new update depop looked like instagram and i was so easy to use and scroll through clothing but now they changed the layout to show only 2 photos side by side. this makes it so much longer to scroll through brands and items and it‚Äôs ugly af. super upset about this update and makes me not want to use the app. i‚Äôm also a seller on there and one of my items was removed for NO reason i reached out to depop and they told me not to repost it or they‚Äôll delete my account... i really want to sell it on depop but looks like i have to list it on poshmark or something else. so annoying

title: consider new payment
review: I love this app, but i‚Äôm having a lot of trouble with paypal. for some reason theres always a problem with trying to print the shipping labels because apparently my account isn‚Äôt ‚Äúverified‚Äù but when I try to work it out paypal shows that there is nothing wrong with my account. paypal always seems to be a problem. I suggest you consider new payment options for depop users because this is beyond annoying.
developerResponse:
{'id': 15777861, 'body': "Hey, sorry about this.
 
If you can follow this link and submit a request if you're still struggling that would be great. https://depophelp.zendesk.com/hc/en-gb/articles/360046290994-I-can-t-access-my-shipping-label-USPS-MyHermes-
 
Team Depop

", 'modified': '2020-06-04T13:41:19Z'}

title: Will Give a Better Review once CHANGES ARE MADE.
review: I‚Äôve heard sooo much ab this app, and it sounds amazing! i go through the process taking pictures of everything that i can sell, and BAM, it asks for a paypal. I don‚Äôt have a paypal, because i‚Äôm underage for it. So basically i can even use the app. what the actual heck? never heard of having to have paypal in order to use an app like that. You might wanna ask Poshmark,Mercari, Letgo, and Vinted for some advice on how to do so! None of my friends have paypal either, so you just lost some users:(
developerResponse: {'id': 2887763, 'body': "Hey there - If you're under 18 you can sign up for an account by using a parent or guardians PayPal account details, provided you've received permission to do so first. We hope this helps as it would be great to have you on-board. Thanks! Team Depop", 'modified': '2018-03-21T11:50:45Z'}

title: Always logs me out and glitches
review: I love this app because I‚Äôm able to sell my old clothes and get money. However, for some reason it always logs me out and when I try to log back in I can‚Äôt even open the app again. This has happened several times. I‚Äôm currently trying to log into my account and the screen pops up ‚ÄúThe operation could not be completed. Please try again later‚Äù. I don‚Äôt know if this is just an issue I‚Äôm having but FIX THIS!! It‚Äôs so annoying.
developerResponse: {'id': 16718169, 'body': "Hey! The good news is we've fixed this bug, if you update to the latest version it should be resolved now. Team Depop", 'modified': '2020-07-18T19:54:52Z'}

title: Great and Addictive
review: Really easy to navigate layout, similarly to Instagram. Nothing busy that crowds your experience. Good search system and fast. Easy to communicate with others. Very community based, unlike Poshmark. Accounts are fairly controlled so there aren‚Äôt many bots. It can be addictive. Great shipping and pricing system. Really easy to post items, sort out orders, and purchases. Amazing layout.
developerResponse: {'id': 5500770, 'body': "You're amazing. What a lovely review to read on a gloomy Monday morning. We are all about community and glad that you're a part of this now <3\nTeam Depop", 'modified': '2018-10-15T09:20:36Z'}

title: great app but needs improvements
review: I love this app I just wish gave more exposure to more smaller accounts rather than just the ones with a lot of followers. I would love to buy from the smaller accounts! Also wish there was a story option so you can post live pics of what your selling it makes it more interactive.
developerResponse:
{'id': 16937799, 'body': 'Hey. We get it, this can be super frustrating. Rest assured, we‚Äôre always looking for ways to discover exciting new users. 

Keep exploring,
Team Depop
', 'modified': '2020-07-28T20:51:45Z'}

title: Best sell your clothing app
review: I love this app and its funny to me how addictive it is like social media. I don't have any complaints expect that it does glitch a lot, popping up deleted messages, very slow sometimes, and exists out on its own time to time, but i know the depop team is working on it so im not stressin, i like the aesthetic of the app even though red isnt really my color.

title: Good App, Ideas for Improvements
review: Love the app, great for selling and buying. one thing i would ask to add to the interface is the option to move your sold items down on the mobile version of the app. You can go on the website on a computer and move sold items down, and it would be great and easier to add that to mobile users :-)

title: Glitch after glitch after glitch
review: Ever since the update I can barely be on the app for THREE MINUTES without it either crashing or glitching. It‚Äôs very frustrating and makes it more difficult than it already is to buy/sell clothes on the app. ‚ÄúMy DNA‚Äù was a terrible thing to include and just allows less exposure to the shops you follow and actually WANT to see. Depop is also not responding to any complaints and makes it obvious it doesn‚Äôt care about its users.
developerResponse:
{'id': 18528245, 'body': "Hey there,

We can imagine how frustrating this is and we‚Äôre currently working to resolve this issue. Please get in touch by going to 'Settings - Need help - Technical issues - I've still got an issue' and send us a report leaving your username and details regarding your listings. 
 
We‚Äôll take it from here,
Team Depop
", 'modified': '2020-10-16T16:08:55Z'}

title: New Update ?
review: I love this app and I've been using it for a few months now but with the recent update; the app has become annoying. When scrolling down and clicking on an item it used to keep your place when you'd click the back button. Now, you can be halfway through looking over items and it sends you back to the top which makes it harder to find items. It may seem like a small complaint but when a keyword is commonly used it makes it annoying.

title: Great! However, some issues
review: Love using it and the interactivity between the seller and buyers is great. A minor thing that bugs me however is when I am scrolling through feed and click a post, when I go back to the last page it resets my search to the top of the page, making searching very annoying
developerResponse: {'id': 15443365, 'body': "Hey! The good news is we've fixed this bug, if you update to the latest version it should be resolved now.\n\nTeam Depop", 'modified': '2020-05-20T10:54:46Z'}

title: Horrible customer service
review: The only reason I'm giving two stars is because the majority of the depop community is filled with creative and kind users. With that said, if you ever have an issue, it will not be solved. The customer service "helpers" are rude and seem like they don't care about your issue at all. I love the environment of depop but every time I buy something I can't help but to feel guilty for supporting a company that seems to not care about its individual users.

title: It‚Äôs a great app but...
review: So I had a drop account and one day I logged out and then I wanted to log back in and so u forgot my password and so k hit the forgot password thing and it wasn‚Äôt es me to enter in my email and so I did but instead of helping me it told me it couldn‚Äôt reset the password for that user
developerResponse:
{'id': 14987868, 'body': 'Hey. Could you please try resetting your password from a laptop or PC. This provides a more secure connection, and should do the trick. Remember, you can use either your username or linked email address to login. Just make sure you‚Äôve typed it correctly with no spaces. 

Let‚Äôs get you back on the app,

', 'modified': '2020-04-29T09:13:33Z'}

title: Honest review.
review: I‚Äôve given this app numerous amounts of times, within the past year. Mind you, I‚Äôve never made an account using my email address or phone number. I‚Äôve tried logging in through Facebook, or Apple ID and once again it says ‚Äúfailed to log in‚Äù. This is getting ridiculous, I tried forgot my password, and it says it cannot reset pastors for that email address. I‚Äôve tried signing up again, and it says I already have an account. This is so annoying.

title: I love it, sometimes...
review: I can‚Äôt use this app for longer than half an hour without it crashing, which is annoying when it comes to putting things up for sale. There‚Äôs also quite a few scammers on here (like everywhere) so be careful! I hope Depop fixes the crashing issue though because it‚Äôs becoming very annoying!!

I'm only writing a review again because depop apparently doesn't know when people have already RATED them a MILLION TIMES. Maybe with all the updates you guys should fix that. I can't tell you how many countless times I've just been on the app and almost every time I'm on it it wants me to rate it ! It gets annoying after a while !

title: Love the app but..
review: Love the app but I wish Depop would allow you to post more than 4 photos!! Then it has us having to make a whole separate post for more photos! Also, the fear of getting scammed by sellers and buyers is a constant struggle!! I know that is out of Depop‚Äôs control but it‚Äôs so annoying

title: Incredible App!
review: I want there to be seeable stories like instagram, so you could talk to your all your followers in some way without having to post something that's not a product but way to interact.

title: Please fix scroll bug
review: I just upgraded to an iPhone 11, and every time I‚Äôm making a search and click on an item, it backs out to the top of the search listings - making me have to scroll down over and over again and I usually only end up checking out maybe the first 50 listings because it gets very annoying

title: Good but needs to be fixed
review: it‚Äôs a good app but PLEASE fix the notification issues. it says i have 3 notifications but i have 0 and the notif won‚Äôt go away. it makes me paranoid i‚Äôm missing something and it‚Äôs just really annoying.
developerResponse: {'id': 9284634, 'body': 'Hi Jimmy, we feel you and we hear you. Our team is working hard to make sure this issue is solved and our community is back on track. Thank you for the feedback.\n\nLove, Depop', 'modified': '2019-06-21T10:49:34Z'}

title: Annoyed
review: Got my first order only for it to tell me my PayPal wasn‚Äôt confirmed. Once I confirmed through PayPal Depop still left it as unconfirmed and says I have to wait 7 days before it confirms. I am not able to print the shipping label until it is confirmed so I cannot send the order. I had to ask the buyer for their address to ship it myself but I don‚Äôt know if they will answer. Just annoying.
developerResponse:
{'id': 19697732, 'body': "Hey. We can imagine how frustrating this is. Head in-app to 'Settings - Support - Need help - Buying - My purchase - I haven't received my item'.
We also moderate the app 24/7 to ensure scammers are kept away. If you notice anything suspicious, please report the item/user in-app (by clicking on the 3 dots top right of their profile/item) so we can investigate.

We're here to help,
Team Depop", 'modified': '2020-12-11T12:33:48Z'}

title: The update makes me want to cry
review: I hate the new search layout. It‚Äôs super inefficient. I loved Depop because it was so easy to find cute things quickly because there were so many photos in the search. I literally hate the new one so much that I don‚Äôt even open the app anymore. It‚Äôs too frustrating. PLEASE make an option to go back to the smaller search layout

title: Depop Scroll
review: I‚Äôm not sure if this is recent, but i‚Äôm positive that i hadn‚Äôt noticed it before. But, when you search for an item, if you click on somebody‚Äôs listing and go back, it scrolls you all the way back up to the top. It‚Äôs honestly quite annoying

{'id': 15396232, 'body': "Hey, sorry to hear about this! The good news is we've got a fix for this bug on the way.

", 'modified': '2020-05-18T15:38:19Z'}

title: Horrible customer support for buyers
review: This is operated like a brand new platform for buying and selling. Depop has horrible customer service. As a buyer on depop I purchased two items for them to never be delivered. When contacting depop for support there was none just referral to a link. Avoid depop try other sites like mercai or poshmark as they care more for their users. Need more customer support for users.
developerResponse: {'id': 3499472, 'body': "Hey there, sorry that two of your purchases never arrived! Being our payment provider, disputes are resolved via PayPal. Nevertheless if they've ruled on something unfairly, Depop protection exists to fill in the gaps so please do let us know the outcome of these disputes. Thanks, Team Depop", 'modified': '2018-05-17T09:48:22Z'}

title: Get rid of paypal, add more diversity on explore page
review: This app used to be super fun when depop didn‚Äôt change their algorithm for the explore page. Only accounts with large followings are on there; they used to rotate it for diversity when the app wasn‚Äôt as popular. Now depop and big accounts are in cahoots together it‚Äôs annoying.
developerResponse: {'id': 2765789, 'body': "Hey there - thanks for your feedback. Our Explore page is curated in-house according to our guidelines, but we're always on the hunt for users taking great pictures and selling great items. Here are some tips for how you could be included - https://depop.zendesk.com/hc/en-gb/articles/209921837-How-do-I-get-featured-on-the-Explore-page- . We hope this helps! Team Depop", 'modified': '2018-03-07T10:18:24Z'}

title: Drop shipping is disgraceful
review: ‚ÄúBrowse the best in vintage and secondhand fashion,‚Äù what a lie. Depop‚Äôs new policy that allows drop shipping goes against everything the app used to be about: a place to buy and sell secondhand items in a sustainable and ethical way. Now depop is supporting child labor, sweatshops, deplorable working conditions, and destroying the planet. All they care about is getting their cut from the drop shipping scammers. What a disappointment.

title: Feedback
review: I would say make it possible to delete accounts easier I get you don‚Äôt want ppl to delete an account. Sometimes ppl might want to change there usernames but then not be able to. And then try to delete the account and make a new one. It‚Äôs just too difficult with this user interface.
developerResponse:
{'id': 5421851, 'body': 'Hi there. You should be able to delete your account by sending us a mail. Was this process not working?

1. Send an email to close@depop.com from the same email address you used to register on Depop.

2. Tell us your email and your username

Love, Depop', 'modified': '2018-10-09T11:24:33Z'}

title: A few changes
review:
Please make it to where sold items move to the bottom of your page on their own! No one needs to see them anyways lol

Make it to where you can type coupon/ discount codes into the new cart feature!

Add a shop rules/ policies/ description tab to each shop.

Add more tab features so you can add sections to a shop such as ‚Äúart‚Äù ‚Äúclothes‚Äù ‚Äúaccessories‚Äù ‚Äúshoes‚Äù ect to keep
shops organized.
developerResponse: {'id': 7752415, 'body': "That's some great add ons you're bringing to us. I will make sure to pass this on to the team for ya and see how we can make some magic happen.\n\nLove, Depop", 'modified': '2019-03-15T13:59:29Z'}

title: i like this app
review: i like this app and it has a very open surface for finding dope products to buy and also sell, but the only thing i don‚Äôt like is when you are on the explore page. the explore page has many cool items set for your preferences, but it also has products that have been sold. so when i see an item i like a lot and see that it‚Äôs already sold, it‚Äôs kind of annoying.

title: laggy
review: one of the laggiest apps i‚Äôve ever used. i have very good wifi but whenever i use it, there is always a huge lag which makes it difficult to use. additionally, when i open a message, it still won‚Äôt be marked as read. i feel like the app should be easier to navigate and should be easier to scroll through people‚Äôs pages, similar to instagram. i also think it would help sellers advertise if there was a forum section. also, there is no notifications center which is annoying!
developerResponse:
{'id': 15443373, 'body': 'Hey. We can imagine how frustrating this is. Please remove cached data by going to ‚ÄòSettings - Apps - Depop - Storage - Clear Data‚Äô on your phone. Then, completely delete and re-download the app. 

We‚Äôll get this sorted,
Team Depop
', 'modified': '2020-05-20T10:55:15Z'}

title: Super annoying glitch
review: Only thing I seem to have a problem with is it will tell me I have a notification I will then go into the app to review it. & the notification on the little app square itself never goes away. & it‚Äôs super annoying!!

title: Great App, 1 Critical Fix
review: I love this app. It works flawlessly. But let‚Äôs cut straight to the chase: The font is terrible. It really needs an improved font to help with saving space, easier reading, and overall better aesthetics.

review: I wish the notifications would disappear after I view them. It‚Äôs so annoying!

title: Payment

title: Depop

title: UPDATE THE APP
review: Please update the app for iPad users!

title: Prefer old Depop
review: The new update isn't that great, the red is pretty obnoxious and not pleasant to look at. When refreshing my own shop, it gets pretty annoying since only half the screen can be pulled down to refresh (so it's really awkward to refresh when I get such a small space to swipe down). Most of the time, a lot of the buttons and part of the text will glitch out and I won't be able t see it and it's really hard to click. I really enjoyed the old setup where I could see what other people liked and not have my notifications at the top. For the looks, I prefer the green buy button from before as this one doesn't really have a nice font choice. The letters are ultra bold and look flattened, the contrasting colors are also distracting. Really not a fan of the font, doesn't look very neat.  The bottom buttons look a little off and aren't as nice to click (sometimes it doesnt feel like you clicked them but you did or the other way around). Even though Im not a fan of the color, I dislike the font choice even more because it looks like the fonts from high school presentations that were thrown together. Still leaving 3 stars though because I hope they'll be able to have a new update and fix these. Especially the glitches, refresh screen size and font.

title: Glitch, Scammers, and will not issue a refund
review: Depop seemed amazing at first, but the first time I purchased something on the app (this entire transaction was completed in-app), there was a glitch and the seller did not receive the prepaid shipping label and the purchase did not show up on my profile. Therefore, the seller had to pay for shipping a second time at the post office and we could not leave feedback for each other. I contacted Depop so the seller could receive a refund but it was so complicated and she decided that she did not want to go through the trouble. I then asked Depop for a refund of the money I paid for shipping which did not end up being used for shipping due to the glitch. Depop is telling me to contact the seller to initiate the refund but I do not want her to go through further trouble for me. Besides, it has been over two weeks since I made the purchase and originally contacted Depop. I am severely disappointed at the way Depop has been handling the glitch, making it so complicated to receive a refund, and replying to my emails so late that this problem has been dragged out for so long. Furthermore, I have seen more scammers than buyers on the app. I do not feel safe using the app because Depop does not verify users. I hope that these issues can be solved quickly or Depop will experience a drop in users.

title: Good app, iffy community.
review: I really like this app but the community can be a little annoying to deal with. I've sold 20 items and bought 10 so far and i have found some good people and good things! Have not been scammed either which is great! My only suggestions as of right now are 1) there should be a "viewed ____ times" feature so you can see how many people have viewed your item, also there should be a way to categorize items by brand when you post and when you search so people can look specifically for urban outfitters or brandy or whatever it is they are trying to find without having to sort through the search results. All in all i love this app and i wish there were more users on it!

title: Love this app!
review: I downloaded this app last January because a GF of mine recommended it. Initially I was only a buyer. I have an Etsy shop that's pretty good and I didn't have expectations to make very much money and at first I really didn't. But I gradually started to put more time into It and posting the same items I was listing on Etsy and and now, less than a year later there are months when I make more money on Depop than I do on Etsy. It does have occasional glitches (every app does though) and sales do vary based on each sellers amount of followers but just like anything else you get you put in. Overall though Depop is an excellent and powerful seller platform with a savvy and attentive staff who actually care about their users.

title: So far, so good
review: I've only used the app a handful of times, but have enjoyed browsing this far. Search filtering could use some refining with some options added. I attempted to search for items with keyword Military and only wanted to see men's items but rather than be able to see all men's items with "military" associations, I was forced to select a specific category-outerwear- and had to go back and select each category individually to see the order items and found it annoying. Pardon the grammar and spelling errors, not the most patient iPhone user.

title: Overall Good
review: I find it to be a bummer that depop takes out 10% of each transaction instead of 5% or a steady 20 cents for each listing as I have seen on other apps. Might not seem like much but for bigger sales it can really add up and take away from the amount you actually get after shipping and cost of the item. There have also recently been a lot of scam messages and robots that haven't been taken care of. Besides that it's one of the better apps out there that I have tried and I like the simplicity of the Instagram layout.

title: Horrible Update
review: This new Depop Update is garbage. The design is terrible (red and black) with the fonts so blocky and huge. Besides that, there are so many bugs as well. Whenever I sell an item that's 100% taken care of (shipped out and left feedback, buyer gets item, leaves feedback) I STILL have that annoying notification that I am missing something. Restarted my phone twice and it didn't go away. A few days later I turned it off again and it finally went away. Also, there's so many scammers now that needs to be taken care of, it's really annoying.

title: Customer service needs work
review: I've had several issues on Depop since I started using it a year ago. Whenever I've contacted Depop Support for assistance, they've taken forever to respond, if they respond at all. Usually it takes several tries over 1-2 weeks to get an unhelpful response that doesn't address my question. They are very quick to lay blame on the user and often don't seem to understand the issue. I don't know if they're understaffed or if they just don't care about their users.

title: New Update
review: I love this app, I really do but the new update is absolutely terrible. It crashed pretty frequently before but, my God, I can't browse for more than 2 mins now before it crashes. If I see an item I like and I click on the seller to view their profile? Crash! Any little thing makes this crash and it's awful. Maybe fix the bugs you had before instead of doing a facelift that frankly no one asked for and is so much less aesthetically appealing than the previous layout.

title: Yes!
review: I love love love absolutely love this app but the only thing is when you're deep on depop and you go check something else on your phone and go back on depop you loose your spot and you have to find or start all over again. Please please fix this, it's super annoying.

title: Fix this.
review: Well, I've only had this app for a couple of weeks, but I keep getting error messages saying "operation could not be complete" or "oops try again later" I tried restarting my phone, restating the app, and even logged out and deleted it! Now, it won't even let me log back in since all it says is "operation could not be complete try again later" it's honestly very annoying.

title: 3.5 with update
review: Have been really in love with the app -- its interface, and how easy it is to navigate but with the current update with the change in font it's very difficult to read. I find the letters to be too spaced out to read and the font is something that take a bit to get use to. I miss the older version font.

title: Honest review
review: Great app for selling and buying. As a seller it took awhile to get attraction to my page and buyers but after awhile they start slowly coming in. Never really had much of a problem so far. Great selection with a lot users

title: White-handed notifications
review: Every time I receive a follower on this app I am greeted with a pair of white hands following my new friend. This is in no way inclusive & is slightly offensive to people of color. I think the skin tones used and promoted should depict the diversity of this app's users.

title: Overall an OK app
review: The feature I really wish it had was being able to select which countries you want to view products from. Also wish it was better at detecting and shutting down scammers as it causes too much drama within the app between users.

title: It's okay
review: I would say the app is overall okay but idk if it's just me or what but I've been trying to get these pants and I've tried with two different cards and it still won't let me buy them it keeps saying "come back later" so idk what's up with that but it's really really REALLY ANNOYING

title: Ok...
review: Depop was amazing at 1st, but they started to delete my items because "they seemed to be unauthentic" when i had proof posted with the item. Great app but unsatisfied that they get 10% of the money I make & don't seem to care about their users

title: Almost perfect
review: Would be 5 stars if it weren't for the bugs. Great people-friendly interface

title: best buy/sell app but crashes a lot
review: I've tried several buy/sell apps and this is the best one, but it crashes a lot and Depop needs to update and fix these bugs and crashes. it's annoying.

title: Thumbs down.
review: Every time you update the app something goes wrong. Right now I'm having trouble with notifications. Specifically message ones where it shows I have a message and after I've checked that message the notification doesn't go away. It's really annoying.
developerResponse: {'id': 1035937, 'body': "Hey, sorry to hear about the issue you've been experiencing. So that we can make sure this gets fixed it would be great if you could send some more details of the issue to productfeedback@depop.com. If you attach a screenshot it would be really helpful to help us narrow down if this is an issue with the app icon badging or the notifications on the tab bar / message itself. Thanks for flagging the issue to us. Team Depop", 'modified': '2017-08-17T08:27:13Z'}

title: Great service
review: I prefer this app over eBay in almost every way, its clean and simple design.

title: Awesome
review: After being a featured seller, my sales went up. Very easy to use. Love the Instagram-style layout.

title: New update
review: This new update is ugly and you guys should be ashamed. I'm a 3 year long store owner on depop ans this new update makes me want to puke. I can't believe you guys thought this would be better than the previous design. This seriously looks like a 10 year old designed it

title: What is this new update??
review: Honestly before the most recent update the app was great. But now it's a complete eye sore and nothing (from the layout to the design) makes any sense. I won't be using the app until some serious changes are made. What a disappointment.

title: Love it
review: This is a super simple easy way to sell and buy. Very active users!

title: Annoying update
